name.value: HL7 International - Public Health

description.value:
The US Public Health Profiles Library is a collection of reusable architecture and content profiles representing common public health concepts and patterns. It is intended as a complement to the US Core Implementation Guide (US Core) that is used to ease implementation burden of healthcare organizations, electronic health record companies, public health agencies, and others involved in the US public health endeavor.
The US Public Health Profiles Library will be instituted in close conjunction with US Core and have an analogous process for implementation, moderation, review, and approval. The intent is to re-use US Core profiles wherever possible and only add profiles that are needed for common public health needs. The library will evolve over time and may be supported by an adjunct profiles registry that includes developing and informational profiles for public health use.
After evaluation and harmonization analysis of two large multi-condition and multi-use case public health projects â€“ Electronic Case Reporting (eCR) and Making Electronic Data More available for Research and Public Health (MedMorph), it was determined that there are many common elements between the two implementation guides (IGs). The short-term scope of this library includes elements common to the above-mentioned FHIR IGs and will define a US Realm specific framework that defines common elements for the implementation guides. The longer-term scope of this will include analysis and inclusion of data elements from Vital Records Death Reporting, Vital Records Birth and Fetal Death Reporting, and other Public Health use cases.
To avoid defining the same profiles multiple times, we have created a US Public Health Profiles Library for use by Public Health and other FHIR standards development efforts to define appropriate FHIR profiles, value sets, etc., once and allow them to be referenced by each of the specific implementation guides. This USPHPL will provide a starting point and framework for inclusion in multiple use case specific implementation guides focused on the exchange of Public Health information to support interoperability among public health systems and reduce provider and implementer burden.

display.value: United States of America

name.value: Architecture Profiles
Content Profiles: Entities
Content Profiles: Clinical
Architecture Extensions
Content Extensions
Example Value Sets

display.value: US Public Health Emergency Outbreak Information

name.value: US Public Health Emergency Outbreak Information

description.value: This Observation profile represents information that is required during a public health emergency/outbreak. This information can be highly variable, so a generic structure has been chosen to represent it.

display.value: US Public Health Patient

name.value: US Public Health Patient

description.value: This Patient profile represents a US Public Health Patient. It is based on the [**US Core Patient**](http://hl7.org/fhir/us/core/STU4/StructureDefinition-us-core-patient.html) profile.

display.value: USPH Content Bundle

name.value: US Public Health Content Bundle

description.value: This Bundle profile organizes the content of the Public Health Message to be exchanged with a Public Health Agency.

display.value: US Public Health Reporting Bundle

name.value: US Public Health Reporting Bundle

description.value: This Bundle profile is used for exchanging a public health report to be submitted to a Public Health Agency.

display.value: US Public Health Composition

name.value: US Public Health Composition

description.value: This Composition profile represents a public health composition.

display.value: US Public Health Encounter

name.value: US Public Health Encounter

description.value: This Encounter profile represents the encounter related to a public health event and is based on the US Core Encounter profile.

display.value: US Public Health Survey Practitioner Group

name.value: US Public Health Survey Practitioner Group

description.value: This Group profile represents survey participant groups, research groups, etc.

display.value: US Public Health Characteristics of Home Environment

name.value: US Public Health Characteristics of Home Environment

description.value: This Observation profile represents characteristics of the patient's home environment.

display.value: US Public Health Disability Status

name.value: US Public Health Disability Status

description.value: This Observation profile represents the Disability Element defined in the Office of the Assistant Secretary for Planning and Evaluation (ASPE) webpage [HHS Implementation Guidance on Data Collection Standards for Race, Ethnicity, Sex, Primary Language, and Disability Status](https://aspe.hhs.gov/basic-report/hhs-implementation-guidance-data-collection-standards-race-ethnicity-sex-primary-language-and-disability-status).

display.value: US Public Health Is Postpartum

name.value: US Public Health Is Postpartum

description.value: This Observation profile represents whether or not the patient is postpartum.

display.value: US Public Health Pregnancy Outcome Observation

name.value: US Public Health Pregnancy Outcome Observation

description.value: This Observation profile represents a result of the pregnancy such as live birth, still birth, miscarriage, etc.

display.value: US Public Health Pregnancy Status Observation

name.value: US Public Health Pregnancy Status Observation

description.value: This Observation profile represents current and/or prior pregnancy statuses and their date ranges, enabling investigators to determine if a patient was pregnant, possibly pregnant, not pregnant or whether the pregnancy status was unknown during a particular date range.

display.value: US Public Health Exposure Contact Information

name.value: US Public Health Exposure Contact Information

description.value: This Observation profile represents potential patient exposure and contact information.

display.value: US Public Health Transportation Details

name.value: US Public Health Transportation Details

description.value: This Observation profile represents transportation details such as the type of transport (plane, train, ship, etc.) along with any associated information (e.g. name of cruise ship, flight number, airport, seat number, cabin number, etc.).

display.value: US Public Health Organization

name.value: US Public Health Organization

description.value: This Organization profile represents an organization involved in public health. It is based on the **US Core Organization** profile.

display.value: US Public Health Tribal Affiliation Extension

name.value: US Public Health Tribal Affiliation Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents an affiliated tribe name and whether or not the patient is an enrolled member of that tribe.

display.value: USbPublic Health Endpoint

name.value: US Public Health Endpoint

description.value: This Endpoint profile for the IG represents a receivers address.

display.value: US Public Health Location

name.value: US Public Health Location

description.value: This Location profile represents the location/facility in which care was provided and is based on the US Core Location profile.

display.value: US Public Health Date Determined Extension

name.value: US Public Health Date Determined Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents the date a status or observation was determined (date of determination).

display.value: US Public Health Date Recorded Extension

name.value: US Public Health Date Recorded Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents the date a status or observation was recorded (recorded date).

display.value: US Public Health PlanDefinition

name.value: US Public Health PlanDefinition

description.value: This PlanDefinition profile describes the US Public Health PlanDefinition.

display.value: US Public Health PractitionerRole

name.value: US Public Health PractitionerRole

description.value: This PractitionerRole profile represents the roles and organizations of the practitioner.

display.value: US Public Health Determination of Reportability Rule Extension

name.value: US Public Health Determination of Reportability Rule Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents a rule that led to the determination of reportability.

display.value: US Public Health Travel History

name.value: US Public Health Travel History

description.value: This Observation profile represents a patient's travel history.

display.value: US Public Health Address Extension

name.value: US Public Health Address Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents where the patient traveled to or visited as an address e.g.: country, state, city, street address (if applicable).

display.value: US Public Health Supplemental Valueset Library

name.value: US Public Health Supplemental ValueSet Library

description.value: This Library profile defines the library containing the US Public Health supplemental value sets.

display.value: US Public Health Triggering ValueSet Library

name.value: US Public Health Triggering ValueSet Library

description.value: This Library profile defines the library containing the US Public Health triggering value sets.

display.value: US Public Health Determination of Reportability Extension

name.value: US Public Health Determination of Reportability Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents the determination of reportability. Reportability is "the quality or state of being reportable or not". Reportability does not equate to the patient having a condition or meeting a case definition (definitively being a case).

display.value: US Public Health Determination of Reportability Reason Extension

name.value: US Public Health Determination of Reportability Reason Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents the reason for the determination of reportability.

display.value: US Public Health Executable ValueSet

name.value: US Public Health Executable ValueSet

description.value: Defines an executable value set as one that SHALL have an expansion included, as well as a usage warning indicating the expansion is a point-in-time snapshot and must be maintained over time for production usage.

display.value: US Public Health Computable ValueSet

name.value: US Public Health Computable ValueSet

description.value: This ValueSet profile defines a computable value set as one that SHALL have an expression-based definition (i.e. a value set defined intensionally using expressions of the code systems involved) and MAY have an expansion included. The expression-based definition SHALL be represented in only one of three ways; using the compose element, using the expression extension, or using the rules-text extension to provide a step-by-step process for expanding the value set definition

display.value: US Public Health Triggering ValueSet

name.value: US Public Health Triggering ValueSet

description.value: This ValueSet profile describes the US Public Health Triggering value set.

display.value: US Public Health Supplemental ValueSet

name.value: US Public Health Supplemental ValueSet

description.value: This ValueSet profile describes the US Public Health Supplemental value set.

display.value: US Public Health ValueSet

name.value: US Public Health ValueSet

description.value: This ValueSet profile describes US Public Health value sets.

display.value: US Public Health Executable Library

name.value: US Public Health Executable Library

description.value: This Library profile sets the minimum expectations for an executable CQL library. Specifically, the profile requires that the library contain one of ELM XML or JSON content, the compiled representation of the CQL logic.

display.value: US Public Health Computable Library

name.value: US Public Health Computable Library

description.value: This Library profile sets the minimum expectations for a computable CQL library.

display.value: US Public Health Alternative Expression Extension

name.value: US Public Health Alternative Expression Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents an US Public Health Alternative Expression.

display.value: US Public Health Named Event Type Extension

name.value: US Public Health Named Event Type Extension

description.value: This Extension profile indicates the types of named events to subscribe to from the EHR.

display.value: US Public Health ValueSet Library

name.value: US Public Health ValueSet Library

description.value: This Library profile defines the library containing US Public Health value sets.

display.value: US Public Health CodeSystem

name.value: US Public Health CodeSystem

description.value: This CodeSystem profile describes the US Public Health CodeSystem.

display.value: US Public Health Usage Warning Extension

name.value: US Public Health Usage Warning Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents an extra warning about the correct use of the value set.

display.value: US Public Health CodeSystem Property Binding Extension

name.value: US Public Health CodeSystem Property Binding Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents a reference to a CodeSystem or ValueSet that establishes the allowable values for a code system property.

display.value: US Public Health MessageHeader

name.value: US Public Health MessageHeader

description.value: This MessageHeader profile represents the header for transmitting content using FHIR messaging.

display.value: US Public Health Document Bundle

name.value: US Public Health Document Bundle

description.value: This Bundle profile represents a Public Health Document Bundle. It contains a US Public Health Composition.

display.value: US Public Health Initiation Reason Extension

name.value: US Public Health Initiation Reason Extension

description.value: This Extension profile contains an explanation for the manual or alternate initiation of the public health report.

display.value: US Public Health Data Encrypted Extension

name.value: US Public Health Data Encrypted Extension

description.value: This exension indicates whether the data in the content bundle is encrypted or not.

display.value: US Public Health Message Processing Category Extension

name.value: US Public Health Message Processing Category Extension

description.value: This Extension profile indicates how systems have to deal with messages in terms of duplicates, lack of responses.

display.value: US Public Health Expansion Parameters Extension

name.value: US Public Health Expansion Parameters Extension

description.value: Thes Extension profile supports the definition of expansion parameters for the ValueSet.

display.value: US Public Health Information Recipient Extension

name.value: US Public Health Information Recipient Extension

description.value: This Extension profile represents a US Public Health Information Recipient.

display.value: US Public Health Receiver Address Extension

name.value: US Public Health Receiver Address Extension

description.value: This Extension profile indicates the endpoint address where the report is to be sent.

display.value: US Public Health Supplemental Library

name.value: US Public Health Supplemental Library

description.value: This Library profile defines the asset-collection library containing the US Public Health supplemental assets.

display.value: US Public Health Specification Library

name.value: US Public Health Specification Library

description.value: This Library profile defines the asset-collection library containing the US Public Health specification assets.

display.value: US Public Health MedicationAdministration

name.value: US Public Health MedicationAdministration

description.value: This MedicationAdministration profile represents the event of a patient consuming or otherwise being administered a medication.

display.value: US Public Health Message Types CodeSystem

name.value: US Public Health Message Types CodeSystem

description.value: The US Public Health Message Types CodeSystem contains codes for currently identified use cases for identifying types of messages being exchanged. As further use cases are identified, codes may be added to the code system.

display.value: US Public Health PlanDefinition Action Codes

name.value: US Public Health PlanDefinition Action Codes

description.value: The US Public Health PlanDefinition Actions CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying actions in PlanDefinition.

display.value: US Public Health TriggerDefinition NamedEvents

name.value: US Public Health TriggerDefinition NamedEvents

description.value: The US Public Health TriggerDefinition NamedEvents CodeSystem is a 'starter set' of codes supported for identifying named events to subscribe to in clinical workflows.

display.value: US Public Health Usage Context

name.value: US Public Health Usage Context

description.value: This code system contains codes that identify the use context of a ValueSet or Library.

display.value: US Public Health Usage Context Type

name.value: US Public Health Usage Context Type

description.value: This code system contains codes that identify the use context type of a ValueSet or Library.

display.value: US Public Health FHIR Query Pattern Extension

name.value: US Public Health FHIR Query Pattern Extension

description.value: This Exension profile supports communicating the FHIR query for a given data requirement.

name.value: US Public Health Pregnancy Status

description.value: This value set contains codes representing pregnancy statuses.

display.value: US Public Health Message Types ValueSet

name.value: US Public Health Message Types ValueSet

description.value: The US Public Health Message Types Value Set is a 'starter set' of codes for uniquely identifying messages in MessageHeader instances contained within a reporting bundle.

name.value: US Public Health TriggerDefinition NamedEvent

description.value: The US Public Health TriggerDefinition NamedEvent Value Set is a 'starter set' of codes for identifying named events uniquely in TriggerDefinition instances contained within a PlanDefinition.

description.value: The US Public Health PlanDefinition Action Value Set is a 'starter set' of codes for uniquely identifying actions in PlanDefinition instances.

display.value: US Public Health Condition Problems and Health Concerns

name.value: US Public Health Condition Problems and Health Concerns

description.value:
This Condition Problems and Health Concerns profile represents the signs, symptoms, and diagnoses related to a public health event.
It is based on the **US Core Condition Problems and Health Concerns Profile** with further restrictions of a US Public Health Patient as the Condition.subject and guidance that in the case of a condition being mistakenly entered into the system and later corrected verificationStatus of 'entered-in-error' must be set.

display.value: US Public Health Condition Encounter Diagnosis

name.value: US Public Health Condition Encounter Diagnosis

description.value:
This Condition Encounter Diagnosis profile represents the signs, symptoms, and diagnoses related to a public health event.
It is based on the **US Core Condition Encounter Diagnosis Profile** with further restrictions of a US Public Health Patient as the Condition.subject and guidance that in the case of a condition being mistakenly entered into the system and later corrected verificationStatus of 'entered-in-error' must be set.
